Posts.Content: Hello, My name is Peggy..in 2007 I was diagnosed w/stage 3 breast cancer..had the Brac 1 gene..was given 1 yr to live..WELL..I'm still here..glory be..anyhoo..what I'm trying to find out is I had 11 lymph nodes removed from my right armpit(obviously my cancer was in my right breast)..but because I had the Brac 1 gene..I decided to have a double mastectomy & complete Hysterectomy in 1 surgery..I was told I would develop ovarian cancer within 3-5 yrs..so had everything removed..I'm fortunate because I have2 sons..I'm now 49..then 42..sorry my question is I'm having huge sensitivity in my lower armpit & a pulling sensation..my cancer Dr.. said this is normal(3 yrs ago)..I also have arthritis & fibro..I've been an athlete my entire life..had chemo every 2 weeks..no port...for 8 treatments..first 4..4 hrs..last 4..8 hrs..sucked..then had radiation..just want to know if any of you out there have had issues since chemo..I'm not talking 1-3 yrs after..I'm talking 5-6 yrs after..I'm new to this site but have been on other sites..I'm gonna be 50 in dec..& my joints & bones r of a 70 yr old..I dont want any of you to get the wrong impression of me..I just want to find out(I already saw on the internet) if any of you are suffering like me
Posts.Title: need advice..also if anyone out there is going thru what I'm going thru
